channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79DCS

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79MCL

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79MCN

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79MCS

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79QSL

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79QSN

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79QSS

item.title: Field - r791asid
item.description: ASID number Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791ASID

item.title: Field - r791asst
item.description: CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running on behalf of this AS in milliseconds. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791ASST Description (assbasst)

item.title: Field - r791bpin
item.description: Number of blocked pages brought in from DASD Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791BPIN

item.title: Field - r791bpne
item.description: Number of blocked pages brought in from expanded storage Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791BPNE

item.title: Field - r791cipg
item.description: Same as RasdCIoPrioGroup Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791cl
item.description: Current location IN - In storage, OT - Swapped out and ready, LO - Logically swapped out, NS - Non swappable, WM - Wait queue/MSO, WL - Wait queue/long wait, WT - Wait queue/term wait, WO - Wait queue/others, DL - TSO user delayed by SRM to meet response time objective, PR - Privileged, » - Transitioning out, « - Transitioning in Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791CL

item.title: Field - r791cmni
item.description: Number of common pages for current transaction Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791CMNI

item.title: Field - r791cprc
item.description: Same as RASDCPROTCPU Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791cpre
item.description: Same as RASDASPROTSTG Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791cpri
item.description: Same as RASDCPROTSTG Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791cpup
item.description: Same as RASDCPUPROTECTED Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791crmp
item.description: The dispatch priority of the address space is currently promoted due to a chronic resource contention Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791ctar
item.description: Central storage target number of frames Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791CTAR

item.title: Field - r791dp
item.description: Dispatcher priority Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791DP

item.title: Field - r791esct
item.description: Number of expanded storage frames used by job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791ESCT

item.title: Field - r791eshp
item.description: Number of hiperspace ES pages used by job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791ESHP

item.title: Field - r791esvi
item.description: Number of VIO ES pages used by job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791ESVI

item.title: Field - r791exct
item.description: EXCP count for this step Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791EXCT

item.title: Field - r791excw
item.description: EXCP Count ( DWord ) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791EXCW

item.title: Field - r791flg
item.description: Flags Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r791xm 0 Cross memory address space r791pmon 1 On = data in R791CTAR is valid. r791valv 2 On = data in R791VAL is valid. r791goal 3 On = system is in GOAL mode r791srv 4 On = this address space is a server address space Off = GOAL specified for this address space is being honored by wlm r791qsc 5 On = address space has been quiesced by a RESET command r791txme 6 Like RASDTRXNMGMTEXEMPT r791taff 7 On = address space has temporal affinities, same as RASDTAF

item.title: Field - r791flg2
item.description: Additional flags Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791FLG2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r791cprc 0 Same as RASDCPROTCPU r791cpre 1 Same as RASDASPROTSTG r791cpri 2 Same as RASDCPROTSTG r791cpup 3 Same as RASDCPUPROTECTED r791stop 4 Same as RASDSTGPROTECTED r791crmp 5 The dispatch priority of the address space is currently promoted due to a chronic resource contention r791txmb 6 Like RASDTRXNMGMTBOTH r791nohp 7 Same as RasdInEligHonorPriority

item.title: Field - r791flg3
item.description: Additional flags Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791FLG3 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r791cipg 0 Same as RasdCIoPrioGroup r791iopg 1 Same as RasdIoPriorityGroup r791itrg 2 R791RGRP is the name of a tenant resource group and R791RCL is the name of a tenant report class r791iisp 3 General purpose and specialty processor consumption is considered by WLM capping algorithms for this address space r791irpb 5 Data in R791RPBoost is valid r791rpboost 6 Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost.

item.title: Field - r791fmct
item.description: Number of real storage frames Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791FMCT

item.title: Field - r791goal
item.description: On = system is in GOAL mode Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791hin
item.description: Number of hiperspace page ins by job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791HIN

item.title: Field - r791hrms
item.description: Number of hiperspace read misses by job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791HRMS

item.title: Field - r791iisp
item.description: General purpose and specialty processor consumption is considered by WLM capping algorithms for this address space Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791iopg
item.description: Same as RasdIoPriorityGroup Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791irpb
item.description: Data in R791RPBoost is valid Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791itrg
item.description: R791RGRP is the name of a tenant resource group and R791RCL is the name of a tenant report class Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791jbn
item.description: Name of job Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791JBN

item.title: Field - r791mlim
item.description: Address space memory limit in units of MB Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791MLIM

item.title: Field - r791nffi
item.description: Normalization factor for IFA service time. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791NFFI Description Used to convert between real IFA times and “normalized” IFA times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP. Multiply R791TIFA by this value and divide by 256 to calculate the normalized IFA time

item.title: Field - r791nffs
item.description: Normalization factor for zIIP service time. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791NFFS Description Used to convert between real zIIP times and “normalized” zIIP times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP. Multiply R791TSUP by this value and divide by 256 to calculate the normalized zIIP time.

item.title: Field - r791nohp
item.description: Same as RasdInEligHonorPriority Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791phta
item.description: zAAP-only equivalent of R791PHTM (ASSB_IFA_PHTM). Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PHTA Description This is normalized time

item.title: Field - r791phti
item.description: zIIP-only equivalent of R791PHTM (ASSB_zIIP_PHTM). Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PHTI Description This is normalized time

item.title: Field - r791phtm
item.description: CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running in this AS in millisecs. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PHTM Description (assbphtm)

item.title: Field - r791pin
item.description: Page in count Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PIN

item.title: Field - r791pine
item.description: Number of single pages brought in from expanded storage Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PINE

item.title: Field - r791pmon
item.description: On = data in R791CTAR is valid. Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Description Off = not valid. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791pnv
item.description: Number of non-VIO pages for current transaction Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PNV

item.title: Field - r791pvio
item.description: Number of VIO pages for current transaction Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791PVIO

item.title: Field - r791qsc
item.description: On = address space has been quiesced by a RESET command Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791rcl
item.description: Report class name Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791RCL

item.title: Field - r791rgrp
item.description: Resource group name Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791RGRP

item.title: Field - r791rpboost
item.description: Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost. Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg3 Description Only valid if R791IRPB = On. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r791flg3.

item.title: Field - r791scl
item.description: Service class name Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791SCL

item.title: Field - r791scp
item.description: Service class period Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791SCP

item.title: Field - r791spi
item.description: Number of page-ins from auxiliary storage for shared page groups Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791SPI

item.title: Field - r791src
item.description: Reason last swap out TO - Terminal output, TI - Terminal input, LW - LONG WAIT, XS - AUX storage short, RS - Real storage short, DW - Detected wait, MP - MEMORY POOL SHORTAGE, NQ - CAP enqueue, EX - CAP exchange, US - CAP uni-swap, TS - Transition, IC - Improve central storage usage, IP - Improve system paging rate, MR - Make room to swap in an out-too-long user, AW - APPC wait, IW - OMVS input wait, OW - OMVS output wait, SR - In-real swap, 00 - Unknown

item.title: Field - r791srv
item.description: On = this address space is a server address space Off = GOAL specified for this address space is being honored by wlm Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791stop
item.description: Same as RASDSTGPROTECTED Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791swc
item.description: Transaction swap count Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791SWC

item.title: Field - r791swmr
item.description: SRM workload recom value Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791SWMR

item.title: Field - r791taff
item.description: On = address space has temporal affinities, same as RASDTAF Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791tas
item.description: Type of user 0 - Batch, 1 - Started task, 2 - Mount task, 3 - TSO, 4 - ASCH, 5 - OMVS Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TAS

item.title: Field - r791tcp
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_CP). Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TCP Description Only valid if zAAPs or zIIPs in configuration

item.title: Field - r791tcpc
item.description: Total CPU time consumed in this address space in milliseconds. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TCPC Description (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+assbphtm) +(assbphtm-assbphtm_base))

item.title: Field - r791tcpu
item.description: Total CPU time consumed on behalf of this address space in milliseconds (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+assbasst). Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TCPU Description Wraps after 4 Giga millisec

item.title: Field - r791tifa
item.description: CPU time consumed on zAAPs (IFAs) (ASSB_TIME_ON_IFA) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TIFA

item.title: Field - r791tifc
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zAAP (IFA) eligible work (ASSB_TIME_IFA_ON_CP) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TIFC

item.title: Field - r791trtm
item.description: Transaction residency time Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TRTM

item.title: Field - r791tsuc
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zIIP eligible work (ASSB_TIME_zIIP_ON_CP) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TSUC

item.title: Field - r791tsup
item.description: CPU time consumed on zIIPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_zIIP) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TSUP

item.title: Field - r791ttod
item.description: Real time into transaction (milliseconds) Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TTOD

item.title: Field - r791twss
item.description: SRM target working set set site Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791TWSS

item.title: Field - r791txmb
item.description: Like RASDTRXNMGMTBOTH Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r791flg2.

item.title: Field - r791txme
item.description: Like RASDTRXNMGMTEXEMPT Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791val
item.description: Recommendation value for WSM managed address spaces. Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791VAL

item.title: Field - r791valv
item.description: On = data in R791VAL is valid. Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Description Off = not valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r791wkld
item.description: Workload name Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791WKLD

item.title: Field - r791wms
item.description: SRM service for the current transaction since the last swap in Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791WMS

item.title: Field - r791wss
item.description: Working set at last swap in Map: R791ELEM Based on: R791WSS

item.title: Field - r791xm
item.description: Cross memory address space Map: R791ELEM Based on: r791flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r791flg.

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Data gatherer call TOD Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time in 0HHMMSSF format Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79par 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering r79sg 1 Report sorted by SG r79rsm 2 Invalid RSM data obtained r79goal 3 System is in GOAL mode r79trxi 4 Invalid transaction data r79srmc 5 SRM mode changed r79inv 6 inval. r79maxd 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S1 Based on: SMF79TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM
